file.name: H2010E001_atmos_12hourly_hus_%start_date%-%end_date%.nc
file.variable: Run by CNRM at Meteo-France HPC facilities

Seasonal Forecast data produced by Meteo-France as its contribution to the seasonal forecast activity of the Copernicus Climate Change Service (C3S). The data has global coverage with a 1-degree horizontal resolution and spans for around 6 months since the start date
